member.name: T:Fluentx.Mvc.JsonBinderAttribute
member.summary: Used for MVC controller view model parameters where you want to serialize JSON posted data (object) to MVC controller.

member.name: T:Fluentx.Mvc.RedirectAndPostActionResult
member.summary: This action result posts the specified data dictionary to the specified url, posted data values will be converted using the default string conversion.
